entry.title: WIND WARNING , Malahat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:04 PM PST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 6.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Malahat 7:00 PM PST Monday 20 February 2023
Temperature: 6.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 94 %
Dewpoint: 5.1°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending after midnight then cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 70 except 70 gusting to 100 near Juan de Fuca Strait. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h except west 50 gusting to 70 near Juan de Fuca Strait in the morning. Wind becoming light in the afternoon. High 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers in the evening. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 near Juan de Fuca Strait late in the evening and overnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 20 February 2023
